When I first saw this torrent, it was being circulated simply as IRON_MAN.ISO. It is true that there are a lot of dumbass uploaders around uploading a Cartoon at the same time as the live action movie, without putting a description on it. But anyway, I did watch the cartoon and it was not bad. In fact, I think the storyline and screenplay in the cartoon was much better than the Robert Downey version.
